question:
You have just moved to a new apartment.
Write a letter to your friend inviting them to come to your new home. In the letter you should:
Explain why you moved.
Describe your new home.
tell them how to get to your apartment.
text: I'm writing to invite you to my new apartment this Friday after work. Please don't bother to bring food because I'll prepare some.

I'm sure that you'll love the new home as it's a brand new building that's more comfortable and also larger than my old flat. Although it's a little far from the city centre, I found it quieter, thus, helping me to concentrate while working from home.

Despite being larger, it's still one-bedroom accommodation with a small kitchen area. In addition to that, I have one corner for my working area. It's so nice because I could see a mountain through the window from there.

To get here, simply take the blue line subway outward from the city and jump off at the stop before the last. Next, continue walking southbound for 5 minutes until you see the red gate of my apartment.
